job_tasks.justification: The job title 'Full Stack Python-developer' inherently describes the core activity of building and integrating software components using Python, which aligns with the definition of traditional software engineering tasks.

profile.rationale: The job title 'Junior Full Stack Python-developer' indicates a role focused on traditional software development using Python. There is no mention of any AI, Machine Learning, or Generative AI tasks, technologies, or responsibilities, which are prerequisites for any of the AI-focused profiles. Thus, it fits the 'Software Engineer' profile, which is defined as exclusively Macro-Category A tasks without AI/ML integration.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is exceptionally short and only provides a title. It lacks any descriptive text about responsibilities, technologies (beyond Python), or required skills, making a detailed analysis and confident profile assignment difficult. The classification as 'Software Engineer' is based solely on the absence of AI/ML mentions in the title, which is a very weak signal.
